channel.title: Another Hmmmmm Issuse
channel.description:
How do you get working defense and mage bonuses?
im sick of people running around hitting heeps and the amour they have dose nothing.
i know it dose nothing because someone hit a 130 on me when i had the perfect ring on and thats 10k+ to all def stats and he still managed to hit heeps on me.
